articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Condolence to Bereaved Family Members of Moon Sun Myung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Condolence to Bereaved Family Members of Moon Sun Myung
						
Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Sunday sent a message of condolence to the bereaved family members of Moon Sun Myung, former president of the World Peace Federation.
					The message said:
					
					On the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of death of Mr. Moon Sun Myung, former president of the World Peace Federation, I express profound sorrow to President Han Hak Ja and bereaved family members.
					
					Mr. Moon Sun Myung made lots of efforts for reconciliation and unity of the nation, reunification of the country and global peace.
					
					It is my hope that President Han Hak Ja and the bereaved family members will continue carrying forward the behest of Mr. Moon Sun Myung.

articles.title: Agreement on Academic and Sports Exchange between DPRK and Japanese Universities Signed
articles.content:
Agreement on Academic and Sports Exchange between DPRK and Japanese Universities Signed
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- An agreement on academic and sports exchange between Korea University of Physical Education and Nippon Sport Science University was signed here on Sunday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony were Ma Chol Su, secretary general of the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, officials of Korea University of Physical Education and members of a delegation of Nippon Sport Science University led by Managing Director Kenshiro Matsunami.
					
					 Sin Tong Gyu, rector of Korea University of Physical Education, and Ryosho Tanigama, rector of Nippon Sport Science University, inked the agreement.

articles.title: DPRK Team Qualified for 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Team Qualified for 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The 2015 AFC U-19 Women's Championship started in Nanjing, China on August 18.
					 The DPRK team played the finals with its Japanese rival on Saturday. It ended in 11 meter kick.
					
					 The DPRK team placed second at the championship and was qualified for the 2016 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup.

articles.title: Football Games between DPRK and Japanese Universities Held
articles.content:
Football Matches between DPRK and Japanese Universities Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Men's and women's football matches between the teams of Korea University of Physical Education and the teams of Nippon Sport Science University took place at the Kim Il Sung Stadium on Sunday.
					 Among the spectators were Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Pak Kun Gwang, chairman of the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, Sin Tong Gyu, rector of Korea University of Physical Education, officials concerned, football experts, soccer fans, working people, school youth and children in the city.
					
					 Members of a delegation of Nippon Sport Science University led by Managing Director Kenshiro Matsunami and Koreans in Japan staying in the socialist homeland watched the matches.
					
					 The teams of Korea University of Physical Education beat their rivals 2:1 and 4:0 in the men's and women's football matches.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Attempt to Deploy Aircraft Carrier in Asia-Pacific
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Attempt to Deploy Aircraft Carrier in Asia-Pacific
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Department of Defense is mulling deploying an aircraft carrier in the Asia-Pacific by transferring it from the Persian Gulf area. An official concerned of the U.S. Department of Defense said this deployment is not because the carrier is not necessary in the Persian Gulf area but it is to give priority to the deployment in the Asia-Pacific.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says the U.S. attempt to deploy the carrier is a product of the U.S. pivot to Asia-Pacific policy, its hostile policy toward the DPRK, in particular.
					
					 It is the invariable scenario of the U.S. to isolate and stifle the DPRK by force, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. attempt proves that the moves of the U.S. to create constant danger of war on the Korean Peninsula and stifle the DPRK by force at any cost have entered a more undisguised phase.
					
					 The Asia-Pacific is becoming a key region in carrying out the U.S. scenario for world domination.
					
					 Some years ago, the U.S. set forth its pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy, considering that whether it maintains its hegemonic position in the region or not is decisive of its destiny in the 21st century. 
					
					 The U.S. sought the deployment of the carrier as a way of pushing forward the above-said strategy.  
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that regional countries will not remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. reckless arms buildup. 
					
					 The DPRK equipped with tremendous capability for self-defense views the U.S. imperialists' deployment of such latest carriers as no more than a ridiculous attempt to show off their muscle.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Interfering in Issue of Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Interfering in Issue of Korean Peninsula
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) --Recently the north and the south of Korea had an exhaustive discussion on the issues of defusing acute military tension on the Korean Peninsula and improving the catastrophic inter-Korean relations and agreed upon the relevant measures.
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary says the acute military tension created between the north and the south this time is attributable to the joint military exercises staged by the U.S. together with the south Korean authorities every year.
					
					 It is the Korean Peninsula where the situation remains so tense that an all-out war may break out any moment due to even a trifling accidental factor.
					
					 One side staging large-scale joint military exercises against the other side in such dangerous place is an act of leading the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase. The DPRK, therefore, has demanded more than once an immediate halt to them.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. got frantic with the maneuvers for a nuclear war against the DPRK while talking about "annual" and defensive ones".
					
					 The U.S. is paying lip-service to peace and detente on the peninsula but it is clear it will reveal its true colors once again sooner or later.
					
					 No one can vouch that the U.S. will not bring the situation on the peninsula back to the orbit of confrontation by interfering in the inter-Korean relations once again and creating complexity.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to refrain from hamstringing the efforts of the Korean people to terminate foreign forces' interference and improve the inter-Korean relations and reunify the country independently and peacefully in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.

articles.title: Drug Smuggling Rife in S. Korea
articles.content:
Drug Smuggling Rife in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Drug-related crimes are getting more rampant in south Korea, according to south Korean Yonhap News. 
					 Drug smuggling is gaining in scope in touch with international criminal bodies.
					
					 The number of cases of drug smuggling uncovered last year was five times that in 2004.
					
					 More than 160 cases of drug smuggling were reported in the first six months of the year, a sharp increase over that last year.
					
					 9.42 tons of narcotics were uncovered by the customs office of Inchon Airport in February.

articles.title: S. Korean Writers Demands Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Sinking Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Writers Demands Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Sinking Disaster
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Writers Council declared on Aug. 27 that it would launch an action calling for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol sinking disaster. 
					 It denounced the present regime for not clarifying the suspicions about the disaster.
					
					 It decided to take a writers action on Aug. 28, 500 days since the disaster in a bid to remember and probe the truth behind the disaster, adding that it will put on tweeter articles reflecting the writers' assertion that day. 
					
					 The body hoped that its action would be a candlelight for probing the truth about the disaster.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked in Cuba
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked in Cuba 
						
Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting, film show and art performance at Jose Marti Military Technical Academy under the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba on August 26 on the occasion of the Day of Songun, 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					Present at the events were Alvaro Lopez Miera, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba who doubles as first vice-minister of the Revolutionary Armed Forces and chief of the General Staff of the Revolutionary Armed Forces, other officials of the ministry, teachers and cadets of the academy.
					
					Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy. 
					
					The participants watched the Korean film "Pyongyang Today" before speeches were made. 
					
					The head of the External Relations Bureau of the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces said:
					
					Thanks to the Songun leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Il the Korean people could have all means to cope with the aggression moves of outsiders, and Korean scientists and technicians could achieve eye-opening successes in the modernization of weaponry and the development of new technology. 
					
					We are sure that the service personnel and people of the DPRK will demonstrate before the world the might of the single-minded unity on the road of Songun indicated by the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					We extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to further bolster up the military power of the country, build a thriving socialist nation and bring earlier the reunification of the country. 
					
					The participants enjoyed an art performance given by the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba.

articles.title: Day of Songun Observed in Guinea
articles.content:
Day of Songun Observed in Guinea
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea published a bulletin titled "Songun August 25" on Aug. 17 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The bulletin noted that on August 25, 1960 Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army which performed brilliant feats during the Fatherland Liberation War. It went on:
					
					 This reflected his will to strengthen the army and lead the revolution and construction in reliance on it.
					
					 He had steadily covered the road of Songun leadership for several decades with this will.
					
					 His Songun leadership developed in depth on a higher stage in the mid-1990s.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership, the military power of the DPRK was bolstered up in every way, to thoroughly foil the moves of the imperialists for aggression. In other words, Korean socialism was firmly defended.
					
					 That is why the Korean people regard the day when he started the Songun leadership as the historic day to go down in the history of the country and significantly celebrate the day every year.

articles.title: Day of Songun Observed by Ghanaian Political Party
articles.content:
Day of Songun Observed by Ghanaian Political Party 
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana released a statement on August 20 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 He said:
					
					 The Songun politics of the DPRK is the only political mode to defend the destiny of the nation and sovereignty of the country by its own efforts in the world where the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the hegemonic forces are rampant.
					
					 The Korean people who were placed in the centre of the global politics by the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il have become a proud people invariably steering the global politics thanks to the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully embodying the Songun idea and leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 I firmly believe that the Workers' Party and people of Korea under the seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Un will surely emerge victorious in their struggle for accelerating a final victory for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Foreign Media Introduce Masikryong Ski Resort, Songdowon International Children's Camp
articles.content:
Foreign Media Introduce Masikryong Ski Resort, Songdowon International Children's Camp
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- The Indian paper New Delhi Times on Aug. 11 said the unknown Masik Pass in the DPRK has now become a topic of discussion of the international community as a world-level ski resort was built there. 
					 The paper went on:
					
					 The Masikryong Ski Resort is the brilliant fruition of the wise leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He personally initiated the construction of the ski resort so that the people may enjoy great happiness and visited the construction site several times, covering rugged road, to indicate orientation and ways for completing the construction project in the shortest possible time. 
					
					 The Masikryong Ski Resort is now drawing keen interest of the world but it will be more splendid in the future. 
					
					 DV-Ros and Prima-Media and other Russian news agencies on August 20 introduced the Songdowon International Children's Camp together with the photos showing the camping of students in the Maritime Territorial Region of Russia. 
					
					 The Myanmar TV Broadcasting Service aired a program introducing the Masikryong Ski Resort and the Songdowon International Children's Camp on August 15 and 16.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Published in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Published in Brazil
						
 Pyongyang, August 30 (KCNA) -- Vol. 3 of Part 1 the Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", the reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, was published in Brazil.
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the Federal University of Santa Catarina of Brazil on August 19.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de condolencias a familiares de difunto Moon Sun Myung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de condolencias a familiares de difunto Moon Sun Myung
   Pyongyang, 30 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 30 un mensaje de condolencias a los familiares del ex presidente de la Federacion Mundial de la Paz, Moon Sun Myung,
					   La misiva senala:
					
					   Con motivo del tercer aniversario del fallecimiento del ex presidente de la Federacion Mundial de la Paz, Moon Sun Myung, extiendo profundas condolencias a la presidenta de la FMP, Han Hak Ja y a sus familiares.
					
					   El senor Moon Sun Myung hizo ingentes esfuerzos por la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion, la reunificacion del pais y la paz mundial.
					
					   Deseo que la presidenta Han y sus familiares continuen el proposito del difunto.
